threads.title: a2289  820-01987   no display and restarting
threads.message:
hello

charging ok normal, display light only had chime sound then goes off then restarting

 
if battery only same  display light only had chime sound then goes off then restarting 

pls helpadvice
 thanks....

threads.title: a2289  820-01987   no display and restarting
threads.message:
Any history fault available?

Test the board alone on the desk.
Don't connect anything, apart of USB-C charger.
Just check if USB meter restarts.

threads.title: a2289  820-01987   no display and restarting
threads.message:
very  clean no history water damage

usb meter:15v 030- 028

threads.title: a2289  820-01987   no display and restarting
threads.message:
Can you test with another charger?
Better to use Apple 87W one.
